text:
November 25, 2014

Senator Charles Schumer (D-NY) talked about what went wrong for the Democratic Party in the 2014 midterm elections, and its plans for the… read more

Senator Charles Schumer (D-NY) talked about what went wrong for the Democratic Party in the 2014 midterm elections, and its plans for the 2016 elections. He talked about his plans for a new “pact with the middle class,” saying that Democrats could become the dominant party for a generation if they showed the middle class that government could work for them. close
title: Senator Charles Schumer D-NY November Midterm

meta_data.description: Senator Charles Schumer (D-NY), the Senate Democratic policy chair, briefs reporters on the Democratic Party's losses in the 2014 midterm elections and its plans for 2016.

og.title: Senator Charles Schumer (D-NY) on November Midterm Elections
